title: Self-Evolving AI Robot System for Lunar Exploration
description: Developing autonomous, self-evolving AI robot systems for lunar exploration and outpost construction under Prof. Kazuya Yoshida at the Space Robotics Lab, Tohoku University, as part of the JST’s Moonshot Goal 3 project.

title: LIDAR Based Object Mapping and Identification Rover
description: An autonomous rover for mapping and object identification, for tracking space debris and warehouse management.

title: Numerically Controlled Oscillator for ISRO’s SEAMS Project
description: Developed a numerically controlled oscillator for spectrum analyzer calibration on the SEAMS payload.

title: 8-bit Microcontroller using Verilog
description: Developed an 8-bit microcontroller for small automation tasks using Verilog on an Nxys DDR FPGA board.

title: Electric Vehicle Charging Management System
description: Developed a cloud platform to manage and control a cluster of electric vehicle charging stations.
